channel.title: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!
channel.description:
# Who will prevail? Who will fall? The answer is in your hands. ![image|328x400](upload://v3ZglOz95CWNNHEuBSS3jehaOmN.jpeg) # Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Hosted by @Marshal and @SirDerpsAlot, with @Icibalus on flavor duty
## Rules - Follow the global forum rules - Folow the Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies rules - If you haven’t posted in 36 hours you will be prodded for activity. If you don’t respond to that prod you will be force replaced or modkilled. - Do not use big text. That is reserved for hosts. - No Editing or Deleting posts - Do not like posts if you are dead
## Gameplay - Days are 48 hours long. Nights are 24 hours long. The deadline to submit actions is 1 hour before the end of the phase(or until plurality would happen in the case of day abilities) - Executions are Plurality and Majority - There are no logs - Game is limited feedback - To vote somebody, do **/vote [Player]**. *No other format will be accepted*
# Game Mechanics - This game is not bastard, but may have bastard mechanics. The OP, the Hosts, and your Rolecard will never lie to you - The 2 main factions are **[color=orchid]Olympus[/color]**(town) and **[color=teal]Titans[/color]**(Mafia) - There may or may not be anticlaim mechanics - There may or may not be neutrals - There may or may not be lost wolves - A player's flip will never be false. It may, however, be cleaned or redacted. - There may or may not be effects that alter investigative results - There may or may not be dead interaction - There will be no vanilla roles - Both the Titans and Olympus will have dreaming gods. These dreaming gods will have a list of choices that can have varying effects on the game. There may or may not be other dreaming gods. - Flavor *will* be alignment indicative. All non-Olympus players will be given flavor safeclaims. - The win condition of the Titans is to *Defeat Olympus and any neutrals that stand in your way*. The win condition of Olympus is *Defeat the Titans and any neutrals that stand in your way*. Any neutrals, if they exist, will have their own win condition.
## Action resolution order Commuters Paranoid Gun Owners Strong-Willed Actions Bus drivers + Redirectors Roleblocks Jailkeeps Protectives Kills Recruitments Investigations/Misc abilities
# Players 1. ~~Geyde~~ ~~Evo~~ **Died Night 3 - [color=teal]Prometheus: Titan JOAT/Inventor[/color]** 1. Apprentice 1. Italy 1. ~~PKR~~ **Executed Day 1 - [color=orchid]Gyges: Olympus Voyeur[/color]** 1. ~~Estel~~ **Died Night 2 - [color=orchid]Tiresias: Olympus 2-shot Tracker[/color]** 1. ~~clonedcheese~~ **Died Day 3 - [color=teal]Ephialtes: Titan Rolecop[/color]** 1. Intensify 1. ~~Crichard564~~ ZoneQ11 1. TheBlueElixir 1. ~~an_gorta_pratai~~ **Died Night 1 - [color=orchid]Theseus: Olympus 1-shot Gladiator[/color]** 1. ~~Centuries~~ **Died Night 4 - [color=red] FLIP CLEANED [/color]** 1. ~~Appelsiini~~ **Died Day 3 - [color=orchid]Daedalus: Olympus 2-shot Bus Driver[/color]** 1. Wazza 1. ~~Ash~~ **Died Day 3 - [color=orchid]Antigone: Olympus Suicide Bomber[/color]** 1. ~~Sulit~~ **Executed Day 5 - [color=teal]Otus: Titan Roleblocker[/color]** 1. ~~TornadoX~~ ~~Vulgard~~ **Died Night 3 - [color=orchid]Silenus: Olympus Strong-Willer[/color]** 1. ModeShifter 1. ~~MaximusPrime~~ **Executed Day 2 - [color=orchid]Meleager: Olympus Odd-night Bodyguard[/color]** 1. ~~KyoDaz~~ **Died Night 3 - [color=teal]Hyperion: Titan Vanillaizer[/color]** 1. ~~Bluestorm~~ ~~Leafia~~ **Executed Day 3 - [color=orchid]Odysseus: Olympus 2-shot Alignment Cop[/color]** 1. Mist **Died Night 1 - [color=orchid]Orpheus: Olympus Roleblocker[/color]** 1. ~~Light~~ **Executed Day 4 - [color=teal]Kronos: Titan Dreaming God[/color]** 1. TrustworthyLiberal 1. ~~Hippoyeetus~~ **Died Day 2 - [color=teal] Atlas: Titan Right Hand Man[/color]**
# Backups
1. Vulgard 3. Ami
# Thread Milestones [End of Day 1/Start of Day 2 ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-day-2-20-24/82422/2884?u=marshal) [Day 2 - Hippoyeetus has Died!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-day-2-20-24/82422/3106?u=marshal) [End of Day 2/Start of Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-night-2-19-24/82422/4544?u=marshal) [Day 3 - ash4fun and Appelsiini die](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-day-3-15-24/82422/5736?u=marshal) [Day 3 - Clonedcheese has died!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-day-3-15-24/82422/5819?u=marshal) [End of Day 3/Start of Day 4 ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-night-4-10-24/82422/6518?u=marshal ) [End of Day 4/Start of Day 5 ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-night-4-10-24/82422/7260?u=marshal) [End of Day 5/Start of Day 6](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/dreaming-gods-and-dreaming-titans-fm-night-5-8-24/82422/7581?u=marshal)

item.title: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
I would say I hope this changes… but I have been rolling scum a lot so I would like whatever faction I am to win. And if that is town, then we need to break this bad streak.

I do not think I was around when town won a mash.

Read full topic

My first thoughts upon seeing me and Apprentice as NKSons was literally ‘Weird pairing but I’ve got a good player’.

item.title: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!
item.dc:creator: TheBlueElixir
item.description:
You played well and we’re well out of the way until ~d4 and the only one to end game as a RHM

Wazza did not ‘get stuck with you’ you got paired as the SKsons that won the game as a team and its something to look back on and be proud of

Congrats lad

Congrats

Read full topic
item.source: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!

item.title: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!
item.dc:creator: Wazza
item.description:
Apprentice:

thanks for carrying

dude, I couldn’t have asked for anything else.
You were the one who made the smart plays, the convincing. If it wasn’t for you, we would’ve lost without a doubt, all I did was carry out the actions while you did all the behind the scenes thing required for our win.

It was teamwork at it’s finest on these forums and I’m glad to have played with you on my side. I couldn’t have asked for anyone else, even if it seemed like a weird pairing from the start. I’m glad it was you.

Read full topic
item.source: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!

item.title: Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans FM - Game Over [5/24] - Bellerophon and Pegasus Win!
item.dc:creator: Apprentice
item.description:
yeah I’m sorry that Wazza got stuck w/ me. Pretty much all of my games are getting an undeserved win or screwing things over for my team and it sucks, but I guess I’ve got to try to get better

@Wazza
thanks for carrying

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Vulgard:

Also, hey. This is the first game I played as town empowerer without empowering scum. I was so happy.

D1: /arcane empower Alice

D2: /whateverSFoL61 empower was called katze

is there more examples

Vulgard:

I’m continuing the legacy of replacing into a lowposter d2 and getting nightkilled n3 at the latest.

honestly im surprised you keep subbing in because it’d fucking demolish my WiM for this to keep happening

Read full topic
